page.title: 19GAMES WE PLAY IN DUNDEE.
page.content: Here is a list of a few games we play in school or near our homes_{Granny , {Queenie Queenie}and{Walk the plank or {join the crew.}How to play {Queenie {Queenie:}someone has a ball, they have to face the wall then they throw the ball over his or hers shoulder. One player has to catch it and hide it behind his or her back then all the players stand up straight and sing {Queenie Queenie who's got the ball is {she big or is she small I've not got {it in my pocket Queenie Queenie who's {got the ball.}As the players finish this rhyme the ball thrower turns around and tries to find out who has the ball. If the ball thrower thinks he or she does not have the ball then they are{empty dustbins.}Another way of finding who has the ball is called {cut the cake}, that means the ball thrower can run behind players.
